name: Mission: Uncontrollable
description:
A puzzle platformer where your character is "out of control"!

Backstory: You'd sent a robot to steal information from bad guys but as soon as it enters bad guys building, you lose your connection to it.

Now that you can't control it, you hack the building's system to help your robot in collecting those information by moving building's platforms.

Controls:

- you can drag  yellow platforms (Don't drag them too quickly, there is no velocity cap)

- R: reset

- Backspace: return to main menu (Press it when you finish a level. You can't leave a level without it because of a bug)

WTH is going on:

- your robot must reach the rainbow PC to steal it's information and open the exit gate.

- Red things bad.

- Green platforms are activated when the green button is pressed

- You may see some bananas (there is a secret in each level)

Major bugs:

- Nothing happens when you beat a level. (you must exit manually)

- You can't touch rainbow PC twice. You'll stick to it. (it prevents you from solving the last puzzle piece of level 4)

- You can't touch secret collectibles. You'll stick to them. (you can still find them)

Post jam update:

I fixed major bugs and it's completely the same game uploaded here (nothing is changed) but without some bugs that prevent you from progressing at some points. If it counts as cheating then ignore this part.

Here is the link (majorbugsfixed): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YaPSX07f-9NcuPfwr9xPPYWXIR50IC54/view?usp=shari...

Mac: https://drive.google.com/file/d/17E56ccyrxDNXSu9v_jXnyCnf2xD-8ZlW/view?usp=shari...

Linux: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xkry0KiVCZZk7VklLbc9OyFBM3zxrYu0/view?usp=shari...
